Title: Anohana: The Flower We Saw That Day - The Movie
Genre: Animation, Adventure, Drama, Family, Fantasy, Mystery, Romance
Actors: Saori Hayami, Yumi Irino, Ai Kayano, Takahiro Sakurai
Plot: A group of friends were separated when one of them died in an accident. Later on she comes back as a ghost trying to get into heaven but to do that her friends must grant her a wish.
